anya-e0103n7:72_4: yadi tāva sakiṁyeva sabbasmiṁ visaye pavattati,
anya-e0103n7:72_6: asaṅkhatasammutidhammānañca ekajjhaṁ upaṭṭhāne dūrato cittapaṭaṁ pekkhantassa viya paṭivibhāgenāvabodho na siyā,
anya-e0103n7:72_7: tathā ca sati “sabbe dhammā anattā”ti vipassantānaṁ anattākārena viya sabbadhammā anirūpitarūpena bhagavato ñāṇassa visayā hontīti āpajjati.
anya-e0103n7:72_8: Yepi “sabbañeyyadhammānaṁ ṭhitalakkhaṇavisayaṁ vikapparahitaṁ sabbakālaṁ buddhānaṁ ñāṇaṁ pavattati,
anya-e0103n7:72_11: tiṭṭhantopi samāhito’ti idampi vacanaṁ suvuttaṁ hotī”ti vadanti,
anya-e0103n7:72_13: ṭhitalakkhaṇārammaṇatāya ca atītānāgatasammutidhammānaṁ tadabhāvato ekadesavisayameva bhagavato ñāṇaṁ siyā.
anya-e0103n7:72_14: Tasmā sakiṁyeva ñāṇaṁ pavattatīti na yujjati.
anya-e0103n7:73_0: Atha kamena sabbasmiṁ visaye ñāṇaṁ pavattati?
anya-e0103n7:73_3: disādesakālādivasena ca anekabhedabhinne ñeyye kamena gayhamāne tassa anavasesapaṭivedho sambhavati,
anya-e0103n7:73_5: Ye pana “atthassa avisaṁvādanato ñeyyassa ekadesaṁ paccakkhaṁ katvā ‘sesepi eva’nti adhimuccitvā vavatthāpanena sabbaññū bhagavā,
anya-e0103n7:73_9: Sabbassa hi appaccakkhabhāve atthāvisaṁvādanena ñeyyassa ekadesaṁ paccakkhaṁ katvā “sesepi eva”nti adhimuccitvā vavatthāpanassa asambhavato.
anya-e0103n7:74_14: Ñātuṁ icchitassa ca sakalassa avisayabhāve tassa ākaṅkhappaṭibaddhavuttitā na siyā,
anya-e0103n7:74_15: ekanteneva sā icchitabbā “sabbe dhammā buddhassa bhagavato āvajjanappaṭibaddhā ākaṅkhappaṭibaddhā manasikārappaṭibaddhā
anya-e0103n7:75_0: Nanu ca etasmiṁ pakkhe yadā sakalaṁ ñātuṁ icchitaṁ,
anya-e0103n7:75_1: tadā sakiṁyeva sakalavisayatāya anirūpitarūpena bhagavato ñāṇaṁ pavatteyyāti vuttadosānātivattiyevāti? Na,
anya-e0103n7:75_4: Aññathā pacurajanañāṇasamānavuttitāya buddhānaṁ bhagavantānaṁ ñāṇassa acinteyyatā na siyā.
anya-e0103n7:75_5: Tasmā sakaladhammārammaṇampi taṁ ekadhammārammaṇaṁ viya suvavatthāpiteyeva te dhamme katvā pavattatīti idamettha acinteyyaṁ.
anya-e0103n7:75_13: kamena vā icchānurūpaṁ sammā sāmañca sabbadhammānaṁ buddhattā sammāsambuddho.
anya-e0103n7:76_4: Tato eva attano visayassa viditakaraṇaṭṭhenapi vijjā.
anya-e0103n7:76_9: aṭṭhannaṁ ca vijjānaṁ tattha tattha sutte gahaṇaṁ vineyyajjhāsayavasenāti daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0103n7:76_10: Satta saddhammā nāma saddhā hirī ottappaṁ bāhusaccaṁ vīriyaṁ sati paññā ca.
anya-e0103n7:76_11: Ye sandhāya vuttaṁ “idha bhikkhu saddho hotī”tiādi.
anya-e0103n7:76_12: Cattāri jhānānīti yāni kānici cattāri rūpāvacarajjhānāni.
anya-e0103n7:77_0: Kasmā panettha sīlādayo pannaraseva “caraṇa”nti vuttāti codanaṁ sandhāyāha “imeyeva hī”tiādi.
anya-e0103n7:77_1: Tena tesaṁ sikkhattayasaṅgahato nibbānupagamane ekaṁsato sādhanabhāvamāha.
anya-e0103n7:78_5: so cettha mahaggatabhāvappattā sādhāraṇabhāvoti āha “caraṇasampadā mahākāruṇikataṁ pūretvā ṭhitā”ti.
anya-e0103n7:78_6: Yathā sattānaṁ anatthaṁ parivajjetvā atthe niyojanaṁ paññāya vinā na hoti,
anya-e0103n7:78_7: evaṁ nesaṁ atthānatthajānanaṁ satthu karuṇāya vinā na hotīti ubhayampi ubhayattha sakiccakameva siyā.
anya-e0103n7:78_10: Tattha yathā taṁ vijjācaraṇasampannoti yathā aññopi vijjācaraṇasampanno,
anya-e0103n7:78_12: Sā panāyaṁ satthu vijjācaraṇasampadā sāsanassa niyyānikatāya sāvakānaṁ sammāpaṭipattiyā ekantakāraṇanti dassetuṁ “tenassā”tiādi vuttaṁ.
anya-e0103n7:79_0: Ettha ca vijjāsampadāya satthu paññāmahattaṁ pakāsitaṁ hoti,
anya-e0103n7:79_22: Tena attahitāya paṭipannādīsu catūsu puggalesu catutthapuggalabhāvo siddho hoti.
anya-e0103n7:79_27: Tathā karuṇāya sabbasattesu janitānuggaho paññānugatattā na ca na sabbattha virattacitto,
anya-e0103n7:79_28: paññāya sabbadhammesu virattacitto karuṇānugatattā na ca na sabbasattānuggahāya pavatto.
anya-e0103n7:79_30: evaṁ paññā ahaṁkāramamaṁkāravinimuttāti aññamaññavisodhitā paramavisuddhā guṇavisesā vijjācaraṇasampadāhi pakāsitāti daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0103n7:80_4: Gamanañca nāma bahuvidhanti idhādhippetaṁ gamanaṁ dassento “ariyamaggo”ti āha.
anya-e0103n7:80_5: So hi nibbānassa gati adhigamoti katvā “gataṁ,
anya-e0103n7:80_7: Idāni tasseva gahaṇe kāraṇaṁ dassetuṁ “tena hesā”tiādi vuttaṁ.
anya-e0103n7:80_9: Asajjamānoti paripanthābhāvena sugatigamanepi asajjanto saṅgaṁ akaronto,
anya-e0103n7:80_11: Atha vā ekāsane nisīditvā khippabhiññāvaseneva catunnampi maggānaṁ paṭiladdhabhāvato asajjamāno asajjanto gato.
anya-e0103n7:80_15: Tena ca bhagavā gatoti āha “iti sobhanagamanattā sugato”ti sobhanattho su-
anya-e0103n7:81_0: Asundarānaṁ dukkhānaṁ saṅkhārappavattīnaṁ abhāvato accantasukhattā ekantato sundaraṁ nāma asaṅkhatā dhātūti
anya-e0103n7:81_4: Suṭṭhu gamanañca nāma paṭipakkhena anabhibhūtassa gamananti āha “pahīne kilese puna apaccāgacchanto”ti.
anya-e0103n7:81_7: sāpi sammāgamanamevāti evampi bhagavā sugatoti dassetuṁ “sammā vā gato”tiādi vuttaṁ.
anya-e0103n7:81_9: “Sabbalokassa hitasukhameva karonto”ti etena mahābodhiyā paṭipadā avibhāgena sabbasattānaṁ sabbadā hitasukhāvahabhāveneva pavattatīti dasseti.
anya-e0103n7:81_10: “Sassataṁ ucchedanti ime ante anupagacchanto gato”ti etena paṭiccasamuppādagatiṁ dasseti.
anya-e0103n7:81_11: “Kāmasukhaṁ attakilamathanti ime anupagacchanto gato”ti etena ariyamaggagatiṁ dasseti.
anya-e0103n7:82_22: Tatiyā nerayikādikassa nerayikādibhāvavibhāvanīkathā yathā “āpāyiko devadatto nerayiko”tiādikā.
anya-e0103n7:82_23: Catutthī “vedavihitena yaññavidhinā pāṇātipātādikataṁ sugatiṁ āvahatī”ti lokassa byāmohanakathā.
anya-e0103n7:82_26: Evaṁ sammā gadattāti yathāvuttaṁ abhūtādiṁ vajjetvā bhūtaṁ tacchaṁ atthasañhitaṁ piyaṁ manāpaṁ tato eva sammā suṭṭhu gadanato sugato da-
anya-e0103n7:82_29: Āpāthagamanamattena kassaci appiyampi hi bhagavato vacanaṁ piyaṁ manāpameva atthasiddhiyā lokassa hitasukhāvahattā.
anya-e0103n7:83_0: Apica sobhanaṁ gataṁ gamanaṁ etassāti sugato.
anya-e0103n7:83_1: Bhagavato hi veneyyajanupasaṅkamanaṁ ekantena tesaṁ hitasukhanipphādanato sobhanaṁ bhaddakaṁ.
anya-e0103n7:83_6: Atha vā sayambhūñāṇena sakalampi lokaṁ pariññābhisamayavasena parijānanto sammā gato avagatoti sugato.
anya-e0103n7:83_7: Tathā lokasamudayaṁ pahānābhisamayavasena pajahanto anuppattidhammataṁ āpādento sammā gato atītoti sugato.
anya-e0103n7:83_8: Lokanirodhaṁ nibbānaṁ sacchikiriyābhisamayavasena sammā gato adhigatoti sugato.
anya-e0103n7:83_9: Lokanirodhagāminiṁ paṭipadaṁ bhāvanābhisamayavasena sammā gato paṭipannoti sugato.
anya-e0103n7:83_10: Tathā yaṁ imassa sadevakassa lokassa diṭṭhaṁ sutaṁ mutaṁ viññātaṁ pattaṁ pariyesitaṁ anuvicaritaṁ manasā,
anya-e0103n7:83_11: sabbaṁ taṁ hatthatale āmalakaṁ viya sammā paccakkhato gato abbhaññāsīti sugato.
anya-e0103n7:84_1: Yo yo loko yathā yathā veditabbo,
anya-e0103n7:84_11: Nirodhūpāyatoti yena vidhinā so nirodho pattabbo,
anya-e0103n7:85_0: Iti “sabbathā lokaṁ avedī”ti vatvā tadatthasādhakaṁ suttaṁ dassento “yattha kho āvuso”tiādimāha.
anya-e0103n7:85_1: Tattha “na jāyatī”tiādinā ujukaṁ jātiādīni paṭikkhipitvā “na cavati na upapajjatī”ti padadvayena aparāparaṁ cavanupapajjanāni paṭikkhipati.
anya-e0103n7:86_0: Kāmaṁ pādagamanena gantvā lokassantaṁ ñātuṁ, daṭṭhuṁ,
anya-e0103n7:86_2: apica parimitaparicchinnaṭṭhāne taṁ paññāpetvā dassemīti dassento “apicā”tiādimāha.
anya-e0103n7:86_5: Aviññāṇake pana utusamuṭṭhānarūpasamudāyamatte paññāpetuṁ na sakkāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0103n7:86_11: desatopi niddisīyati yathā “cakkhuṁ loke piyarūpaṁ sātarūpaṁ,
anya-e0103n7:87_5: Tasmāti yasmā lokassantaṁ apatvā vaṭṭadukkhato mutti natthi, tasmā.
anya-e0103n7:87_9: Lokantagūti pariññābhisamayena lokaṁ viditvā pahānābhisamayena lokantagū.
anya-e0103n7:88_1: Evaṁ yadipi lokavidutā anavasesato dassitā sabhāvato dassitattā,
anya-e0103n7:88_2: loko pana ekadeseneva vuttoti taṁ anavasesato dassetuṁ “apica tayo lokā”tiādi vuttaṁ.
anya-e0103n7:88_9: santāno ca okāsaloko lokiyanti ettha tasā,
anya-e0103n7:88_18: saddo “ayamāhāro anuppannassa vā kāmacchandassa uppādāyā”tiādīsu viya.
anya-e0103n7:88_19: Evaṁ hi “sabbe sattā”ti iminā asaññasattāpi pariggahitā honti.
anya-e0103n7:88_21: na sattadhammoti āha “āhāraṭṭhitikāti āgataṭṭhāne saṅkhāraloko veditabbo”ti.
anya-e0103n7:89_4: bhikkhu sammā nibbindamāno sammā virajjamāno sammā vimuccamāno sammā pariyantadassāvī sammadatthaṁ abhisamecca diṭṭheva dhamme dukkhassantakaro hoti.
anya-e0103n7:89_9: na saṅkhāravisayāti āha “sassato lokoti vā asassato lokoti vā āgataṭṭhāne sattaloko veditabbo”ti.
anya-e0103n7:90_0: Yāvatā candimasūriyā pariharantīti yattake ṭhāne candimasūriyā parivattanti paribbhamanti.
anya-e0103n7:90_1: Disā bhanti virocamānāti tesaṁ paribbhamaneneva tā disā pabhassarā hutvā virocanti.
anya-e0103n7:90_2: Tāva sahassadhā lokoti tattakaṁ sahassappakāro okāsaloko,
anya-e0103n7:91_2: Eko lokoti “sabbe sattā āhāraṭṭhitikā”ti yāya puggalādhiṭṭhānāya kathāya sabbesaṁ saṅkhārānaṁ paccayāyattavuttitā vuttā,
anya-e0103n7:91_3: tāya sabbo saṅkhāraloko eko ekavidho pakārantarassa abhāvato.
anya-e0103n7:91_4: Dve lokātiādīsupi iminā nayena attho veditabbo. Nāma-
anya-e0103n7:91_7: Nanu ca “āhāraṭṭhitikā”ti ettha paccayāyattavuttitāya maggaphaladhammānampi lokatā āpajjatīti?
anya-e0103n7:91_10: Atha vā “na lujjati na palujjatī”ti yo gahito tathā na hoti,
anya-e0103n7:91_11: so lokoti taṁgahaṇarahitānaṁ lokuttarānaṁ natthi lokatā.
anya-e0103n7:92_4: tadanattā”ti vacanato dukkhānattatā ca pakāsitā hontīti tīṇipi sāmaññalakkhaṇāni gahitāni.
anya-e0103n7:92_8: tāni ca atthato pathavīādayoti aviseseneva salakkhaṇato saṅkhārā gahitā.
anya-e0103n7:92_11: tepi gahitā eva hontīti āha “iti ayaṁ saṅkhāralokopi sabbathā vidito”ti.
anya-e0103n7:93_0: Āgamma cittaṁ seti etthāti āsayo migāsayo viya.
anya-e0103n7:93_1: Yathā migo gocarāya gantvā paccāgantvā tattheva vanagahane sayatīti so tassa āsayo,
anya-e0103n7:93_2: evaṁ aññathā pavattitvāpi cittaṁ āgamma yattha seti,
anya-e0103n7:96_0: Tattha sabbadiṭṭhīnaṁ sassatucchedadiṭṭhīhi saṅgahitattā sabbepi diṭṭhigatikā sattā imā eva dve diṭṭhiyo sannissitā.
anya-e0103n7:97_0: Āsayaṁ jānātīti catubbidhampi sattānaṁ āsayaṁ jānāti.
anya-e0103n7:98_0: “Kāmaṁ sevantaññeva jānāti ‘ayaṁ puggalo kāmagaruko kāmāsayo kāmādhimutto’ti,
anya-e0103n7:98_1: kāmaṁ sevantaññeva jānāti ‘ayaṁ puggalo nekkhammagaruko nekkhammāsayo nekkhammādhimutto’ti”ādi.
anya-e0103n7:99_0: Appahīnabhāvena santāne anu anu sayantīti anusayā,
anya-e0103n7:99_3: Appahīnā hi kilesā kāraṇalābhe sati uppajjanti.
anya-e0103n7:99_7: Na hi dhammānaṁ kālabhedena sabhāvabhedo atthi.
anya-e0103n7:99_8: Taṁ sattavidhaṁ anusayaṁ tassa tassa sattassa santāne paroparabhāvena pavattamānaṁ jānāti.
anya-e0103n7:100_6: Taṁ caritaṁ sabhāvato saṁkilesavodānato samuṭṭhānato phalato nissandatoti evamādinā pakārena jānāti.
anya-e0103n7:101_10: Indriyānaṁ hi tikkhamudubhāvādinā yathārahaṁ adhimuttiyā tikkhamudubhāvādiko veditabbo.
anya-e0103n7:101_11: Tathā hi vuttaṁ sammohavinodanīyaṁ “heṭṭhā gahitāpi adhimutti idha sattānaṁ tikkhindriyamudindriyabhāvadassanatthaṁ puna gahitā”ti.
anya-e0103n7:102_1: appaṁ vā rajaṁ paññāmaye akkhimhi etesanti apparajakkhā,
anya-e0103n7:103_10: imassa dosarajo appo”tiādinā apparajakkhesu jānanaṁ veditabbaṁ.
anya-e0103n7:103_12: Tasmāti yasmā bhagavā aparimāṇe satte āsayādito anavasesetvā jānāti,
anya-e0103n7:103_13: tasmā assa bhagavato sattalokopi sabbathā vidito.
anya-e0103n7:104_0: Nanu ca sattesu pamāṇādipi jānitabbo atthīti? Atthi.
anya-e0103n7:104_1: Tassa pana jānanaṁ na nibbidāya virāgāya nirodhāyāti idha na gahitaṁ,
anya-e0103n7:105_0: “Atha kho bhagavā parittaṁ nakhasikhāyaṁ paṁsuṁ āropetvā bhikkhū āmantesi ‘taṁ kiṁ maññatha,
anya-e0103n7:105_3: yo vāyaṁ mayā paritto nakhasikhāyaṁ paṁsu āropito,
anya-e0103n7:106_3: Sā hi nemimaṇḍalasadisena cakkavāḷapabbatena samantato parikkhittattā “cakkavāḷa”nti vuccati.
anya-e0103n7:107_2: Accuggato tāvadevāti tattakameva caturāsīti yojanasahassāniyeva ubbedho.
anya-e0103n7:109_4: dvācattālīsa yojanasahassāni samudde ajjhogāḷho tattakameva ca upari uggato yugandharapabbato,
anya-e0103n7:109_5: ekavīsa yojanasahassāni samudde ajjhogāḷho tattakameva ca upari uggato īsadharo pabbatoti iminā nayena sesesupi upaḍḍhupaḍḍhapamāṇatā veditabbā.
anya-e0103n7:109_7: evaṁ yāva sinerupādamūlāti heṭṭhā sinerupamāṇato upaḍḍhapamāṇopi yugandharapabbato pathaviyaṁ suppatiṭṭhito,
anya-e0103n7:109_13: Te vitthārato yathākkamaṁ sineruādīnaṁ accuggatasamānaparimāṇāti vadanti.
anya-e0103n7:110_0: Sinerussa samantatoti parikkhipanavasena sinerussa samantato ṭhitā.
anya-e0103n7:110_3: Evaṁ taṁ taṁ parikkhipitvā ṭhitā “sinerussa samantato”ti vuttā.
anya-e0103n7:111_1: himavā pañca pabbatoti himavā pabbato pañca yojanānaṁ satāni ucco ubbedho.
anya-e0103n7:114_2: Tassa āsannabhāvena candamaṇḍalaṁ attano chāyāya vikalabhāvena upaṭṭhāti.
anya-e0103n7:114_13: Tiṇṇaṁ hi pattānaṁ aññamaññaāsannabhāvena ṭhapitānaṁ antarasadise tiṇṇaṁ tiṇṇaṁ cakkavāḷānaṁ antare ekeko lokantaranirayo.
anya-e0103n7:115_4: anantāni cakkavāḷānī”ti tividhampi anantaṁ buddhañāṇaṁ paricchindati sayampi anantattā.
anya-e0103n7:115_12: Anantatā cassa anantañeyyapaṭivijjhaneneva veditabbā tattha appaṭihatacārattā.
anya-e0103n7:115_15: sā pana parato abhiññākathāyaṁ āgamissatīti idha na gahitā.
anya-e0103n7:116_4: Sadevake hi loke sadisakappopi nāma koci tathāgatassa natthi,
anya-e0103n7:116_9: visesapaccayānaṁ saddhāsativīriyapaññānañca ukkaṁsappattiyā samudāgamato paṭṭhāya anaññasādhāraṇo savāsanapaṭipakkhassa
anya-e0103n7:116_11: Tena bhagavā sadevakaṁ lokaṁ aññadatthu abhibhuyya pavattati,
anya-e0103n7:117_6: Taṁ hi anaññasādhāraṇaṁ satthu vimuttiguṇaṁ ārabbha pavattati,
anya-e0103n7:117_7: pavattamānañca atakkāvacaraṁ paramagambhīraṁ saṇhasukhumaṁ savisayaṁ paṭipakkhadhammānaṁ suppahīnattā suṭṭhu pākaṭaṁ vibhūtataraṁ katvā pavattati,
anya-e0103n7:117_9: bhavaṅgaparivāsassa ca atiparittakattā lahuṁ lahuṁ pavattatīti.
anya-e0103n7:118_0: Evaṁ sīlādiguṇehi bhagavato uttaritarassa abhāvaṁ dassetvā idāni sadisassāpi abhāvaṁ dassetuṁ “asamo”tiādi vuttaṁ.
anya-e0103n7:118_1: Tattha asamoti ekasmiṁ kāle natthi etassa sīlādiguṇena samā sadisāti asamo.
anya-e0103n7:119_0: Na kho panāhaṁ samanupassāmīti mama samantacakkhunā hatthatale āmalakaṁ viya sabbalokaṁ passantopi tattha sadevake…pe…
anya-e0103n7:119_1: pajāya attanā attato sīlasampannataraṁ sampannatarasīlaṁ kañci puggalaṁ na kho pana passāmi,
anya-e0103n7:120_2: sattā apadā vā dvipadā vā catuppadā vā bahuppadā vā rūpino vā arūpino vā saññino vā asaññino vā nevasaññināsaññino vā,
anya-e0103n7:120_3: tathāgato tesaṁ aggamakkhāyati arahaṁ sammāsambuddho. Ye,

anya-e0103n7:191_0: Sambhattā bahavo satthu, bhagavā tena vuccati.
anya-e0103n7:192_1: Yasmā tathāgato bodhisattabhūtopi purimāsu jātīsu pāramiyo pūrento bhagasaṅkhātaṁ siriṁ,
anya-e0103n7:192_3: yasañca vami uggiri kheḷapiṇḍaṁ viya anapekkho chaḍḍayi.
anya-e0103n7:192_4: Tathā hissa somanassakumārakāle hatthipālakumārakāle ayogharapaṇḍitakāle mūgapakkhapaṇḍitakāle cūḷasutasomakāleti
anya-e0103n7:192_5: evamādīsu nekkhammapāramipūraṇavasena devarajjasadisāya rajjasiriyā pariccattaattabhāvānaṁ parimāṇaṁ natthi.
anya-e0103n7:192_7: cakkavattisampattisannissayaṁ sattaratanasamujjalaṁ yasañca tiṇāyapi amaññamāno nirapekkho pahāya abhinikkhamitvā sammāsambodhiṁ abhisambuddho,
anya-e0103n7:192_8: tasmā ime siriādike bhage vamīti bhagavā.
anya-e0103n7:192_12: Tepi bhagavā vami tannivāsasattāvāsasamatikkamanato tappaṭibaddhachandarāgappahānena pajahīti.
anya-e0103n7:195_8: sabbaṁ saṁyojanaṁ samucchinditvā amataṁ dhātuṁ samadhigacchanto vami uggiri anapekkho chaḍḍayi na paccāvami.
anya-e0103n7:195_9: Tathā hesa sabbatthakameva pathaviṁ āpaṁ tejaṁ vāyaṁ,
anya-e0103n7:195_10: cakkhuṁ sotaṁ ghānaṁ jivhaṁ kāyaṁ manaṁ,
anya-e0103n7:195_11: rūpe sadde gandhe rase phoṭṭhabbe dhamme,
anya-e0103n7:195_27: dhammavicāra”ntiādinā anupadadhammavibhāgavasenapi sabbeva dhammakoṭṭhāse anavasesato vami uggiri anapekkhapariccāgena chaḍḍayi.
anya-e0103n7:196_2: taṁ tathāgato puna paccāvamissatīti netaṁ ṭhānaṁ vijjatī”ti.
anya-e0103n7:197_1: Atha vā bhāge vamīti sabbepi kusalākusale sāvajjānavajje hīnapaṇīte kaṇhasukkasappaṭibhāge dhamme ariyamaggañāṇamukhena
anya-e0103n7:201_0: Kaṇhā sukkā yato vantā, tatopi bhagavā mato.
anya-e0103n7:203_0: “Bhāgavā bhatavā bhāge, bhage ca vani bhattavā;
anya-e0103n7:204_0: Bhage vami tathā bhāge, vamīti bhagavā jino”ti.
anya-e0103n7:205_0: Ettha ca yasmā saṅkhepato attahitasampattiparahitapaṭipattivasena duvidhā buddhaguṇā,
anya-e0103n7:205_8: Tasmā tesaṁ vibhāvanavasena pāḷiyaṁ “araha”ntiādīnaṁ padānaṁ gahaṇaṁ veditabbaṁ.
anya-e0103n7:206_0: Tattha “araha”nti iminā padena pahānasampadāvasena bhagavato attahitasampatti vibhāvitā.
anya-e0103n7:206_9: “Sugato”ti pana iminā samudāgamato paṭṭhāya bhagavato attahitasampatti,
anya-e0103n7:206_11: “Anuttaro purisadammasārathi satthā devamanussāna”nti imehi padehi bhagavato parahitapaṭipatti vibhāvitā.
anya-e0103n7:206_14: Evañca katvā “sammāsambuddho”ti vatvā “buddho”ti vacanaṁ samatthitaṁ hoti.
anya-e0103n7:206_16: “Bhagavā”ti ca imināpi samudāgamato paṭṭhāya bhagavato sabbā attahitasampatti,
anya-e0103n7:207_2: Tattha “arahaṁ sammāsambuddho vijjācaraṇasampanno lokavidū”ti imehi padehi phalasampattivasena buddhaguṇā vibhāvitā.
anya-e0103n7:207_3: “Anuttaro purisadammasārathi satthā devamanussāna”nti imehi sattūpakāravasena buddhaguṇā pakāsitā.
anya-e0103n7:207_6: “Sugato bhagavā”ti pana imehi padehi hetuphalasattūpakāravasena buddhaguṇā vibhāvitāti veditabbaṁ.
anya-e0103n7:208_4: pariyuṭṭhānappattehi rāgehi sahitaṁ cittaṁ araññamiva corehi tena pariyuṭṭhitanti vuttaṁ,
anya-e0103n7:208_9: Etasmiṁ pakkhe rāgenāti rāgena hetunāti attho.
anya-e0103n7:208_13: Atha vā ujugatamevāti kammaṭṭhānassa vīthiṁ otiṇṇatāya līnuddhaccavigamanato majjhimasamathanimittapaṭipattiyā ujubhāvameva gataṁ.
anya-e0103n7:209_1: “So bhagavā itipi araha”ntiādinā pubbe vuttappakārena buddhaguṇe anuvitakkayatoti sambandho.
anya-e0103n7:209_7: Pīti uppajjatīti bhāvanāvasena upacārajjhānanipphādikā balavatī pīti uppajjati.
anya-e0103n7:209_9: Kāyacittadarathāti kāyacittapassaddhīnaṁ paṭipakkhabhūtā sukhumāvatthā uddhaccasahagatā kilesā.
anya-e0103n7:209_11: Anukkamena ekakkhaṇeti yadā buddhaguṇārammaṇā bhāvanā uparūpari visesaṁ āvahantī pavattati,
anya-e0103n7:209_15: bhāvanāya paguṇatāya vitakkavicārā sātisayaṁ paṭukiccāva honti,
anya-e0103n7:209_18: passaddhakāyassa samādhipadaṭṭhānaṁ sukhaṁ thirataraṁ hutvā pavattati,
anya-e0103n7:209_19: sukhena anubrūhitaṁ cittaṁ kammaṭṭhāne sammadeva samādhiyati.
anya-e0103n7:209_20: Evaṁ anukkamena pubbabhāge vitakkādayo uparūpari paṭupaṭutarabhāvena pavattitvā bhāvanāya majjhimasamathapaṭipattiyā
anya-e0103n7:209_21: indriyānañca ekarasabhāvena paṭutamāni hutvā ekakkhaṇe jhānaṅgāni uppajjanti.
anya-e0103n7:210_2: nevassa tasmiṁ samaye rāgapariyuṭṭhitaṁ cittaṁ hoti…pe…
anya-e0103n7:211_0: Kasmā panettha jhānaṁ appanāpattaṁ na hotīti āha “buddhaguṇānaṁ pana gambhīratāyā”tiādi.
anya-e0103n7:211_1: Gambhīre hi ārammaṇe gambhīre udake patitanāvā viya samathabhāvanā patiṭṭhaṁ na labhati,
anya-e0103n7:211_6: bhāvanāya pana vaḍḍhamānāya paññattiṁ samatikkamitvā sabhāveyeva cittaṁ tiṭṭhati.
anya-e0103n7:211_7: Nanu ca sabhāvadhammepi katthaci appanā samijjhati dutiyāruppajjhānādīti?
anya-e0103n7:211_11: Evampi yathā nānappakāresu kesādikoṭṭhāsesu manasikāraṁ pavattentassa ekasmiṁyeva koṭṭhāse appanāvasena bhāvanā avatiṭṭhati,
anya-e0103n7:211_14: Tattha hi satipi koṭṭhāsabahubhāve ekappakāreneva bhāvanā vattati paṭikkūlākārasseva gahaṇato,
anya-e0103n7:211_16: na ayamekasmiṁyeva guṇe ṭhātuṁ sakkoti bhāvanābalena paccakkhato buddhaguṇesu upaṭṭhahantesu saddhāya balavabhāvato.
anya-e0103n7:212_11: Dukkhādhivāsanasamattho buddhānussatiyā sarīradukkhassa padumapalāse udakassa viya vinivaṭṭanato.
anya-e0103n7:212_13: Buddhabhūmiyaṁ cittaṁ namati buddhaguṇānaṁ mahantabhāvassa paccakkhato upaṭṭhānato.
anya-e0103n7:212_14: Buddhānussatibhāvanāya sabbadā buddhaguṇānaṁ citte viparivattanato vuttaṁ “sammukhā satthāraṁ passato viyā”ti.
anya-e0103n7:212_15: Uttari appaṭivijjhantoti imāya bhāvanāya upari taṁ adhiṭṭhānaṁ katvā saccāni appaṭivijjhanto.
anya-e0103n7:213_3: Evaṁ mahānubhāvāyāti vuttappakārena nīvaraṇavikkhambhanādisamatthena satthari sagāravabhāvādihetubhūtena mahatā sāmatthiyena samannāgatāya.
anya-e0103n7:215_1: sabhāvattho ca ādito vuttoyevāti taṁ anāmasitvā bhāvanāvidhānameva dassetuṁ “dhammānussatiṁ bhāvetukāmenāpī”tiādi āraddhaṁ.
anya-e0103n7:215_2: Kasmā panettha buddhānussatiyaṁ viya “aveccappasādasamannāgatenā”ti na vuttaṁ.
anya-e0103n7:215_3: Nanu etā paṭipāṭiyā cha anussatiyo ariyasāvakānaṁ vasena desanaṁ āruḷhāti?
anya-e0103n7:215_5: evaṁ santepi “parisuddhasīlādiguṇānaṁ puthujjanānampi ijjhantī”ti dassanatthaṁ “aveccappasādasamannāgatenā”ti idha na vuttaṁ,
anya-e0103n7:215_7: Tathāpi pāḷiyaṁ āgatattā ca buddhānussatiniddese vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṁ,
anya-e0103n7:216_3: Lokuttaradhammovāti avadhāraṇaṁ nippariyāyena sandiṭṭhikādiatthaṁ sandhāya vuttaṁ,
anya-e0103n7:216_5: Tathā hi pariyattidhammo bahussutena āgatāgamena paramena satinepakkena samannāgatena paññavatā ādikalyāṇatādivisesato sayaṁ daṭṭhabboti sandiṭṭhiko.
anya-e0103n7:216_9: “Sandiṭṭhiyā jayatī”ti ayaṁ panattho titthiyanimmaddane nippariyāyatova labbhati,
anya-e0103n7:216_16: ime dhammā sarāgāya saṁvattanti no virāgāya,
anya-e0103n7:216_18: saupādānāya saṁvattanti no anupādānāya. Ekaṁsena, gotami,
anya-e0103n7:216_25: pageva adhammā”ti ca evamādīhi suttapadehi vibhāvetabbo.
anya-e0103n7:216_28: Tato eva vaṭṭadukkhanittharaṇatthikehi attano citte upanayanaṁ,
anya-e0103n7:216_29: cittassa vā tattha upanayanaṁ arahatīti opaneyyiko.
anya-e0103n7:216_32: Evaṁ sandiṭṭhikādipadesu pariyattidhammampi pakkhipitvā manasikāro yujjateva.
anya-e0103n7:217_3: Kiñcāpi avayavavinimutto samudāyo nāma paramatthato koci natthi,
anya-e0103n7:217_4: yesu pana avayavesu samudāyarūpena avekkhitesu “gāthā”ti samaññā,
anya-e0103n7:217_5: taṁ tato bhinnaṁ viya katvā saṁsāmivohāraṁ āropetvā dassento “paṭhamena pādena ādikalyāṇā”tiādimāha.
anya-e0103n7:217_6: “Ekānusandhika”nti idaṁ nātibahuvibhāgaṁ yathānusandhinā ekānusandhikaṁ sandhāya vuttaṁ,
anya-e0103n7:217_7: itarassa pana teneva desetabbadhammavibhāgena ādimajjhapariyosānabhāgā labbhantīti.
anya-e0103n7:218_0: Ayaṁ kathā visesato suttapiṭakasaṁvaṇṇanāti katvā suttapiṭakavasena dhammassa ādikalyāṇādikaṁ dassetvā
anya-e0103n7:218_1: idāni suttapiṭakavinayapiṭakānaṁ vasena taṁ dassetuṁ “sanidānasauppattikattā”tiādi vuttaṁ.
anya-e0103n7:218_5: dhammadesanāya ca taṁtaṁsikkhāpadabhāvena paññāpiyamānassa veneyyajjhāsayānurūpaṁ pavattiyamānassa anurūpato.
anya-e0103n7:219_0: Evaṁ suttavinayavasena pariyattidhammassa ādimajjhapariyosānakalyāṇataṁ dassetvā idāni tīṇi piṭakāni
anya-e0103n7:222_7: Paññā pana anubodhapaṭivedhavasena duvidhāti tadubhayampi gaṇhanto “vipassanāmaggehi majjhekalyāṇo”ti āha.
anya-e0103n7:222_10: tato paraṁ kattabbaṁ natthīti dassento āha “phalanibbānehi pariyosānakalyāṇo”ti.
anya-e0103n7:223_11: So pana abhisambodhi paccekabodhi sāvakabodhīti tividho,
anya-e0103n7:223_17: tadosānatāya ca sāsanadhammassa tatiyāya pariyosānakalyāṇatā vuttā.
anya-e0103n7:224_1: Nīvaraṇavikkhambhanatoti vimuttāyatanasīse ṭhatvā saddhammaṁ suṇantassa nīvaraṇānaṁ vikkhambhanasambhavato.
anya-e0103n7:225_3: tathā tathā so tattha labhati atthavedaṁ labhati dhammaveda”nti.
anya-e0103n7:226_3: pañcassa nīvaraṇāni tasmiṁ samaye pahīnāni hontī”ti –
anya-e0103n7:227_1: Samathavipassanāsukhāvahanatoti samathasukhassa ca vipassanāsukhassa ca sampādanato.
anya-e0103n7:228_0: “So vivicceva kāmehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakkaṁ savicāraṁ vivekajaṁ pītisukha”ntiādi.

anya-e0103n7:233_3: Tādibhāvāvahanatoti chaḷaṅgupekkhāvasena iṭṭhādīsu tādibhāvassa lokadhammehi anupalepassa āvahanato.
anya-e0103n7:233_4: Esa bhagavā vuttanayena tividhakalyāṇaṁ dhammaṁ desento yaṁ sāsanabrahmacariyaṁ,
anya-e0103n7:234_19: Saddatthā hi abhinnarūpā viya hutvā viniyogaṁ gacchanti.

anya-e0103n7:235_2: Tattha yadipi nettiyaṁ byañjanamukhena byañjanatthaggahaṇaṁ hotīti “akkharaṁ pada”ntiādinā byañjanapadāni paṭhamaṁ uddiṭṭhāni,
anya-e0103n7:235_3: idha pana pāḷiyaṁ “sātthaṁ sabyañjana”nti āgatattā atthapadāniyeva paṭhamaṁ dassetuṁ “saṅkāsanapakāsanā”tiādi vuttaṁ.
anya-e0103n7:235_4: Tattha saṅkhepato kāsanaṁ dīpanaṁ saṅkāsanaṁ “maññamāno bhikkhu baddho mārassa,
anya-e0103n7:235_9: Ādikammasmiṁ hi ayaṁ pasaddo “paññapeti paṭṭhapetī”tiādīsu viya.
anya-e0103n7:235_11: Tikkhindriyo hi saṅkhepato paṭhamañca vuttamatthaṁ paṭipajjati.
anya-e0103n7:235_14: Yathā “kusalā dhammā”ti saṅkhepato sakiṁyeva ca vuttassa atthassa “katame dhammā kusalā?
anya-e0103n7:235_15: Yasmiṁ samaye kāmāvacaraṁ kusalaṁ citta”ntiādinā vitthārato vivaraṇavasena,
anya-e0103n7:235_19: vibhattassa ca pakārehi ñāpanaṁ veneyyānaṁ cittaparitosanaṁ uttānīkaraṇapaññāpanāni.
anya-e0103n7:235_20: Yathā “phasso hotī”tiādinā vivaṭavibhattassa atthassa “katamo tasmiṁ samaye phasso?
anya-e0103n7:235_21: Yo tasmiṁ samaye phasso phusanā samphusanā”tiādinā uttānīkiriyā,
anya-e0103n7:236_0: Kathaṁ panāyaṁ pāṭhavikappo jātoti? Vuccate – nettipāḷiyaṁ āgatanayena purimapāṭho. Tattha hi –
anya-e0103n7:241_1: Pacchimo pana “paññapeti paṭṭhapeti vivarati vibhajati uttānīkaroti ‘passathā’ti cāhā”ti sutte āgatanayena byañjanamattakato.
anya-e0103n7:241_5: paṭhamameva ṭhapanaṁ paṭṭhapana”nti imāni padāni saṅkāsanapakāsanapadehi atthato avisiṭṭhāni.
anya-e0103n7:241_6: Yañca purimapāṭhe chaṭṭhaṁ padaṁ “pakārato ñāpana”nti paññāpanaṁ vuttaṁ,
anya-e0103n7:241_7: taṁ dutiyapāṭhe pakāsanapadena “nibbisesaṁ pakārato kāsana”nti katvā.
anya-e0103n7:241_10: buddhiyā ca nisānaṁ yāthāvato vatthusabhāvāvabhāsane jāyatīti.
anya-e0103n7:241_11: Evaṁ atthapadarūpattā pariyattiatthassa yathāvuttachaatthapadasamāyogato sātthaṁ sāsanaṁ.
anya-e0103n7:242_0: Akkharapadabyañjanākāraniruttiniddesasampattiyāti ettha uccāraṇavelāyaṁ apariyosite pade vaṇṇo akkharaṁ.

anya-e0103n7:242_5: Saṅkhepato vuttaṁ padābhihitaṁ atthaṁ byañjetīti byañjanaṁ, vākyaṁ.
anya-e0103n7:242_10: Etesaṁ akkharādīnaṁ byañjanapadānaṁ sampattiyā sampannatāya sabyañjanaṁ.
anya-e0103n7:243_8: tathā akkharehi ugghāṭetvā padehi vineti ugghaṭitaññuṁ,
anya-e0103n7:243_17: Evaṁ tīsu kālesu tidhā desito dosattayavidhamano guṇattayāvaho tividhaveneyyavinayanoti.

anya-e0103n7:244_5: Te panete atthādayo yasmā sasādīhi viya mahāsamuddo mandabuddhīhi dukkhogāhā,
anya-e0103n7:244_17: tesaṁ tesaṁ vā dhammānaṁ paṭivijjhitabbo salakkhaṇasaṅkhāto aviparītasabhāvo.
anya-e0103n7:244_18: Tepi cete atthādayo yasmā anupacitakusalasambhārehi duppaññehi sasādīhi viya mahāsamuddo dukkhogāhā,
anya-e0103n7:244_21: Tesu paṭivedhassāpi atthasannissitattā vuttaṁ “atthagambhīratāpaṭivedhagambhīratāhi sāttha”nti atthaguṇadīpanato.
anya-e0103n7:244_22: Tāsaṁ dhammadesanānaṁ byañjanasannissitattā vuttaṁ “dhammagambhīratādesanāgambhīratāhi sabyañjana”nti tāsaṁ byañjanasampattidīpanato.
anya-e0103n7:245_1: Atthadhammaniruttipaṭisambhidāsu pabhedagataṁ ñāṇaṁ paṭibhānapaṭisambhidāti imissāpi paṭisambhidāya atthavisayattā
anya-e0103n7:245_6: Tattha pabhedagatāni ñāṇāni dhammaniruttipaṭisambhidāti āha “dhammaniruttipaṭisambhidāvisayato sabyañjananti,
anya-e0103n7:245_12: Atthasampannanti phalena hetuno anumānaṁ nadīpūrena viya upari vuṭṭhippavattiyā.
anya-e0103n7:246_0: Atha vā paṇḍitavedanīyato sāttha”nti paññāpadaṭṭhānatāya atthasampannataṁ āha,
anya-e0103n7:246_4: Gambhīrādhippāyato sātthanti adhippāyato agādhāpāratāya atthasampannaṁ aññathā tadabhāvato.
anya-e0103n7:247_2: Adhigamabyattitoti saccapaṭivedhena adhigamaveyyattiyasabbhāvato sātthaṁ kapilavatādi viya tucchaṁ niratthakaṁ ahutvā atthasampannanti katvā.
anya-e0103n7:247_4: Āgamabyattitoti durakkhātadhammesu paricayaṁ karontassa viya sammohaṁ ajanetvā bāhusaccaveyyattiyasabbhāvato sabyañcanaṁ.
anya-e0103n7:248_0: Evaṁ ādikalyāṇatādiapadesena satthu purimavesārajjadvayavasena dhammassa svākkhātataṁ vibhāvetvā idāni
anya-e0103n7:248_1: pacchimavesārajjadvayavasenāpi taṁ dassetuṁ “atthavipallāsābhāvato vā suṭṭhu akkhātoti svākkhāto”ti vatvā
anya-e0103n7:248_3: Tattha vipallāsamāpajjatīti tesaṁ dhamme “antarāyikā”ti vuttadhammānaṁ vipākādīnaṁ antarāyikattābhāvato ekaṁsena apāyūpapattihetutāya abhāvato.
anya-e0103n7:248_5: saṁsārato ca niyyānikāti vuttadhammānaṁ ekaccayaññakiriyāpakatipurisantaraññāṇādīnaṁ tato niyyānikattābhāvato viparīto eva hoti.
anya-e0103n7:248_8: Tathābhāvānatikkamanatoti kammantarāyādīnaṁ pañcannaṁ antarāyikabhāvassa ariyamaggadhammānaṁ niyyānikabhāvassa kadācipi anativattanato.
anya-e0103n7:249_0: Nibbānānurūpāya paṭipattiyāti adhigantabbassa sabbasaṅkhatavinissaṭassa nibbānassa anurūpāya sabbasaṅkhāranissaraṇūpāyabhūtāya
anya-e0103n7:249_2: Paṭipadānurūpassāti sabbadukkhaniyyānikabhūtā ārammaṇakaraṇamattenāpi kilesehi anāmasanīyā yādisī paṭipadā,
anya-e0103n7:249_4: Supaññattāti sīlādikkhandhattayasaṅgahitā sammādiṭṭhiādippabhedā micchādiṭṭhiādīnaṁ pahāyikabhāvena suṭṭhu sammadeva vihitā.
anya-e0103n7:249_6: Evaṁ magganibbānānaṁ paṭipadāpaṭipajjanīyabhāvehi aññamaññānurūpatāya svākkhātataṁ dassetvā idāni tividhassāpi
anya-e0103n7:249_7: lokuttaradhammassa paccekaṁ svākkhātataṁ dassetuṁ “ariyamaggo cetthā”tiādi vuttaṁ.
anya-e0103n7:249_18: dhammaṁ desessāmi amatañca tāṇañca leṇañcā”tiādinā tesu tesu suttesu sassatādibhāvakittanavasena.
anya-e0103n7:250_0: 148.“Rāgādīnaṁ abhāvaṁ karontena ariyapuggalena sāmaṁ daṭṭhabbo”ti iminā “ariyamaggena mama rāgādayo
anya-e0103n7:250_1: pahīnā”ti sayaṁ attanā anaññaneyyena daṭṭhabboti sandiṭṭhi,
anya-e0103n7:251_0: Tenatena ariyasāvakena parasaddhāya parassa saddahanena paraneyyena gantabbataṁ hitvā ñāpetabbataṁ pahāya paccavekkhaṇañāṇena karaṇabhūtena.
anya-e0103n7:251_2: Ariyamaggo attanā sampayuttāya sandiṭṭhiyā kilese jayati,
anya-e0103n7:251_4: nibbānaṁ ārammaṇakaraṇena attano visayībhūtāya sandiṭṭhiyā kilese jayatīti yojanā.
anya-e0103n7:252_2: Phalampi heṭṭhimaṁ sakadāgāmivipassanādīnaṁ paccayabhāvena upari maggādhigamassa upanissayabhāvato pariyāyato
anya-e0103n7:253_2: aparapariyāye”tiādinā phaladānaṁ pati āgametabbo kālo atthi,
anya-e0103n7:253_6: Phaladānaṁ pati kālo pakaṭṭho assāti kāliko,
anya-e0103n7:254_4: Amanuññampi kadāci payojanavasena yathāsabhāvappakāsanena dassetabbaṁ bhaveyyāti tadabhāvaṁ dassento āha “manuññabhāvappakāsanenā”ti.
anya-e0103n7:255_2: upaneyyova opaneyyikoti imassa atthassa adhippetattā āha “upanetabboti opaneyyiko”ti.
anya-e0103n7:255_3: Citte upanayanaṁ uppādananti āha “idaṁ saṅkhate lokuttaradhamme yujjatī”ti.
anya-e0103n7:255_4: Citte upanayananti pana ārammaṇabhūtassa dhammassa ārammaṇabhāvūpanayane adhippete asaṅkhatepi yujjeyya
anya-e0103n7:256_2: Te pana ekaṁsato ugghaṭitaññūādayo hontīti āha “ugghaṭitaññūādīhī”ti.
anya-e0103n7:256_3: “Paccatta”nti etassa “pati attanī”ti bhummavasena attho gahetabboti āha “attani attanī”ti.
anya-e0103n7:256_6: Tattha “me”ti iminā “paccatta”nti padena vuttamatthaṁ anvayato dassetvā puna byatirekena dassetuṁ “na hī”tiādi vuttaṁ,
anya-e0103n7:256_8: “Viññūhī”ti idaṁ antogadhāvadhāraṇanti dassento “bālānaṁ pana avisayo cesā”ti āha.
anya-e0103n7:257_0: Evaṁ ādikalyāṇatādinā aññamaññassa anurūpadesanāya dhammassa svākkhātataṁ dassetvā idāni purimassa purimassa
anya-e0103n7:257_2: Tattha sandiṭṭhikattāti yasmā ayaṁ dhammo vuttanayena sāmaṁ daṭṭhabbo,
anya-e0103n7:257_6: Iminā nayena sesapadesupi yathārahaṁ attho daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0103n7:258_0: 153.Tassevantiādīsu yaṁ vattabbaṁ, taṁ buddhānussatiyaṁ vuttanayena veditabbaṁ.
anya-e0103n7:260_3: sadevakena ca lokena “saraṇa”nti araṇīyato ariyo ca so saṅgho ca,
anya-e0103n7:261_2: Sā ariyamaggapaṭipadā paṭipakkhadhamme anivattidhamme katvā pajahanato payojanābhāvā sayampi anivattidhammā,
anya-e0103n7:261_6: tassā ca paṭipannattā ariyasaṅgho “suppaṭipanno”ti vuttoti dassetuṁ “suṭṭhu paṭipanno”tiādi vuttaṁ.
anya-e0103n7:261_8: Punappunaṁ nivattane hi sati ujuppaṭipatti na hoti.
anya-e0103n7:262_0: Yathānusiṭṭhaṁ paṭipajjanena kiccasiddhito ariyabhāvāvahaṁ savanaṁ sakkaccasavanaṁ nāmāti vuttaṁ “sakkaccaṁ suṇantīti sāvakā”ti,
anya-e0103n7:262_1: tena ariyā eva nippariyāyato satthu sāvakā nāmāti dasseti.
anya-e0103n7:262_4: Ariyānañhi sīladiṭṭhiyo majjhe bhinnasuvaṇṇaṁ viya ninnānākaraṇaṁ maggenāgatattā.
anya-e0103n7:262_5: Tena te yattha katthaci ṭhitāpi saṁhatāva.
anya-e0103n7:262_14: taṁ vā ñāyati paṭivijjhīyati etenāti ñāyo.
anya-e0103n7:262_16: Anurūpattā sāmīci opāyikātipi saṅkhaṁ samaññaṁ gatā sammāpaṭipatti,
anya-e0103n7:262_22: “suppaṭipannā ca suppaṭipannā ca suppaṭipannā”ti ekasesanayena vā gahitānaṁ samūho “suppaṭipanno”ti vuttoti dasseti.
anya-e0103n7:263_0: Evaṁ ādipadatthaniddesabhāvena itarapadānaṁ atthaṁ vatvā idāni catunnampi padānaṁ avomissakaṁ atthaṁ dassetuṁ “apicā”tiādi vuttaṁ.
anya-e0103n7:263_5: Ettha ca svākkhāte dhammavinaye apaṇṇakapaṭipadaṁ paṭipannattāti evaṁ sambandhitabbaṁ.
anya-e0103n7:263_6: Purimapadena sambandhe dutiyapadaṁ na vattabbaṁ siyā,
anya-e0103n7:263_7: nanu ca dutiyapadena sambandhepi paṭhamaṁ padaṁ na vattabbaṁ siyāti?
anya-e0103n7:263_9: Sā pana sāvakānaṁ apaṇṇakapaṭipadā yathānusiṭṭhaṁ paṭipadāti dassanatthaṁ “yathānusiṭṭhaṁ paṭipannattā”ti vattabbaṁ.
anya-e0103n7:264_0: Kilesajimhavasena antadvayagāhoti sabbaso taṁ pahāya sammāpaṭipadā kāyādivaṅkappahāyinī ujuppaṭipatti hotīti āha “majjhimāya paṭipadāya…pe…
anya-e0103n7:265_3: sīsaṁ vā ajjhupekkhitvāpi paṭipajjitabbamevāti āha “ñāyo vuccati nibbāna”nti.
anya-e0103n7:265_5: maggañāṇādīhi vā ñāyati paṭivijjhīyati sacchikarīyati cāti ñāyo nibbānanti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0103n7:266_0: Guṇasambhāvanāya parehi kayiramānaṁ paccupaṭṭhānādisāmīcikammaṁ arahantīti sāmīcikammārahā.
anya-e0103n7:267_0: 156.Yadidanti antogadhaliṅgavacanabhedo nipātoti tassa vacanabhedena atthamāha “yā imānī”ti.
anya-e0103n7:267_3: Tena itarāni tīṇi yugaḷāni dassitāni hontīti āha “evaṁ cattāri purisayugaḷāni hontī”ti.
anya-e0103n7:267_5: Purisā ca te puggalā ca purisapuggalā.
anya-e0103n7:267_7: “puggalā”ti pana dutiyāyapi sattasāmaññenāti evaṁ vā ettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0103n7:267_10: Dātabbanti vā paccattavacanaṁ “catunnaṁ paccayāna”nti padaṁ apekkhitvā sāmivasena pariṇāmetabbaṁ,
anya-e0103n7:267_11: aññathā yesaṁ kesañci catunnaṁ paccayānaṁ “āhuna”nti samaññā siyā.
anya-e0103n7:267_13: Sakkādīnampi vā āhavananti sakkādīhipi diyyamānaṁ dānaṁ.
anya-e0103n7:267_14: Yattha hutaṁ mahapphalanti yasmiṁ āvahanīyaggimhi hutaṁ dadhiādi āhuneyyaggigahapataggidakkhiṇeyyaggīsu hutato uḷāraphalanti tesaṁ brāhmaṇānaṁ laddhi.
anya-e0103n7:268_0: Ṭhapetvā 165 teti te piyamanāpe ñātimitte apanetvā,
anya-e0103n7:268_2: Ekabuddhantare ca dissatīti ekasmiṁ buddhantare vītivatte dissati. Ca-
anya-e0103n7:268_3: saddena kadāci asaṅkhyeyyepi kappe vītivatteti dasseti.
anya-e0103n7:269_0: Dakkhanti etāya sattā yathādhippetāhi sampattīhi vaḍḍhantīti dakkhiṇā.
anya-e0103n7:271_1: Natthi ito uttaraṁ visiṭṭhanti hi anuttaraṁ.
anya-e0103n7:271_3: Khittaṁ vuttaṁ bījaṁ mahapphalabhāvakaraṇena tāyati rakkhati,
anya-e0103n7:271_4: khipanti vapanti ettha bījānīti vā khettaṁ, kedārādi,
anya-e0103n7:273_2: aho vata acchiddānīti evaṁ sabbattha yojetabbaṁ.
anya-e0103n7:273_6: Parassa sīlāni anussariyamānāni piyamanāpabhāvāvahanena kevalaṁ mettāya padaṭṭhānaṁ honti,
anya-e0103n7:273_7: na visuṁ kammaṭṭhānanti āha “attano sīlāni anussaritabbānī”ti.
anya-e0103n7:274_2: ekajjhaṁ samādāne uddesakkamena sīlānaṁ ādiantaṁ veditabbaṁ.
anya-e0103n7:274_16: Tato eva taṁsamaṅgīpuggalo serī sayaṁvasī bhujisso nāma hoti.
anya-e0103n7:274_18: “Imināhaṁ sīlena devo vā bhaveyyaṁ devaññataro vā,
anya-e0103n7:274_20: “sīlena suddhī”ti ca evamādinā taṇhādiṭṭhīhi aparāmaṭṭhattā ayaṁ te sīlesu dosoti catūsu vipattīsu yāya
anya-e0103n7:275_0: 159.Sikkhāya sagāravoti sīladhanaṁ nissāya paṭiladdhasamādānattā sātisayaṁ sikkhāya sagāravo sappatisso hoti.
anya-e0103n7:275_4: so tāya visabhāgavutti nāma hoti vilomanato.
anya-e0103n7:275_5: Yathā parehi saddhiṁ attano chiddaṁ na hoti,
anya-e0103n7:275_7: Sikkhāya sagāravattā eva tattha appamatto hoti.
anya-e0103n7:275_8: Attānuvādabhayaṁ parānuvādabhayaṁ daṇḍabhayaṁ duggatibhayanti evamādīni bhayāni imassa dūrasamussāritānīti āha “attānuvādādibhayavirahito”ti.
anya-e0103n7:277_2: Niccaṁ sadā pavattā dānasaṁvibhāgā yassa so niccapavattadānasaṁvibhāgo, tena.
anya-e0103n7:277_8: Ito dāni pabhutīti ito paṭṭhāya dāni ajjatagge ajjadivasaṁ ādiṁ katvā.
anya-e0103n7:277_11: Tattha nimittaṁ gaṇhitvāti tasmiṁ dāne pariccāgacetanāya pavattiākārassa sallakkhaṇavasena nimittaṁ gahetvā.
anya-e0103n7:277_12: Vigatamalamaccheratādiguṇavasenāti vigatāni malamaccherāni etasmāti vigatamalamacchero, cāgo,
anya-e0103n7:278_0: Sataṁdhammaṁ anukkamanti sādhūnaṁ bodhisattānaṁ dhammaṁ paveṇiṁ anu anu kamanto okkamanto,
anya-e0103n7:279_2: tena maccherena ceva lobhādimalena cāti attho.
anya-e0103n7:279_7: Sotāpannassa satoti gehaṁ āvasantassa sotāpannassa samānassa.
anya-e0103n7:279_10: Abhibhavitvāti agāraṁ āvasantānaṁ aññesaṁ uppajjanakarāgādiupakkilese abhibhuyya.
anya-e0103n7:280_5: evaṁ dānabahulo puggalo “payatapāṇī”ti vuttoti dassento “dātuṁ sadā dhotahatthoyevā”ti āha.
anya-e0103n7:280_12: Yājena yuttoti dānena yutto sadā pariccajanato.
anya-e0103n7:281_1: Yathā parisuddhasīlassa puggalassa akhaṇḍatādiguṇavasena attano sīlassa anussarantassa sīlānussatibhāvanā ijjhati,
anya-e0103n7:281_2: evaṁ parisuddhauḷārapariccāgassa puggalassa anupakkiliṭṭhameva attano pariccāgaṁ anussarantassa bhāvanā
anya-e0103n7:282_5: Paṭiggāhakesu mettāyanavasena pariccāgo hotīti mettāya mettābhāvanāya anulomakārī anurūpapaṭipatti.
anya-e0103n7:282_6: Visāradoti visado attanova guṇena katthacipi amaṅkubhūto abhibhuyya vihārī.
anya-e0103n7:284_2: Yādisā hi ariyānaṁ santāne lokiyāpi saddhādayo,
anya-e0103n7:284_7: Tettiṁsa sahapuññakārino tatthūpapannāti taṁsahacaritaṁ ṭhānaṁ tāvatiṁsaṁ,
anya-e0103n7:284_17: Devatā sakkhiṭṭhāne ṭhapetvāti “yathārūpāya maggenāgatāya saddhāya samannāgatā,
anya-e0103n7:284_18: sīlena sutena cāgena paññāya samannāgatā ito cutā tattha upapannā tā devatā,
anya-e0103n7:284_19: mayhampi tathārūpā saddhā sīlaṁ sutaṁ cāgo paññā ca saṁvijjatī”ti devatā sakkhiṭṭhāne ṭhapetvā sakkhiṁ
anya-e0103n7:285_1: taṁ kathanti anuyogaṁ manasi katvā āha “sutte panā”tiādi.
anya-e0103n7:285_3: tāsañca devatāna”nti ubhayaṁ samadhuraṁ viya sutte kiñcāpi vuttaṁ.
anya-e0103n7:285_5: Sakkhiṭṭhāne ṭhapetabbanti “vutta”nti parato padaṁ ānetvā sambandhitabbaṁ.
anya-e0103n7:285_6: Kimatthaṁ pana sakkhiṭṭhāne ṭhapananti āha “devatānaṁ attano saddhādīhi samānaguṇadīpanatthanti veditabba”nti.
anya-e0103n7:285_7: Kasmā pana sutte yathārutavasena atthaṁ aggahetvā evaṁ attho gayhatīti āha “aṭṭhakathāyañhī”tiādi.
anya-e0103n7:286_0: 163.Tasmāti yasmā aṭṭhakathāyaṁ devatā sakkhiṭṭhāne ṭhapetvā attano guṇānussaraṇaṁ daḷhaṁ katvā vuttaṁ,
anya-e0103n7:286_1: sīlacāgānussatīsu viya idhāpi attano guṇānussaraṇaṁ jhānuppattinimittaṁ yuttaṁ, tasmā.
anya-e0103n7:286_5: Yadi attano eva idha guṇā anussaritabbā,
anya-e0103n7:286_10: Pubbabhāge vā pavattaṁ devatāguṇānussaraṇaṁ upādāya “devatānussatī”ti imissā samaññā veditabbā.
anya-e0103n7:286_11: Tathā hi vakkhati “pubbabhāge devatā ārabbha pavattacittavasenā”ti.
anya-e0103n7:288_4: Atthavedanti vā hetuphalaṁ paṭicca uppannaṁ tuṭṭhimāha.
anya-e0103n7:288_6: “Ārakattā araha”nti anussarantassa hi yaṁ taṁ bhagavato kilesehi ārakattaṁ, so hetu.
anya-e0103n7:288_14: “yasmā pana sā sammāpaṭipadā”tiādinā ca tattha tattha hetuapadeso katoyevāti.
anya-e0103n7:289_6: kasmā mahānāmasuttādīsu bahūsu suttesu ariyasāvakaggahaṇaṁ katanti?
anya-e0103n7:292_0: 166.Evaṁ santepīti evaṁ mahānāmasuttādīsu anekesu suttesu ariyasāvakasseva vasena chasu anussatīsu desitāsupi.
anya-e0103n7:292_2: Pītiṁ paṭilabhitvāti anussavavasena buddhārammaṇaṁ pītiṁ uppādetvā.
